description: Miltank is a cow Pokémon that provides a highly nutritious milk, especially during a post-gestation period. Miltank`s milk and its derivatives, such as yogurt, are popular with children and adults and can even be used as a form of natural medicine for the sick and weary, as well as other Pokémon. Over five gallons of milk can be gathered daily from a single Miltank.
name: Miltank
